blocks.name: uniinn0
blocks.content: Sufficient and necessary condition for a union to intersect with a given set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm uniinn0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wne(cin(cuni(c0), c1), emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  necon1abii(cin(cuni(c0), c1), emptycls, wrex(s0, c0, wne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls)))
  3bitr3i(wn(wrex(s0, c0, wne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls))), wceq(cin(cuni(c0), c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wn(wne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls))), wral(s0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls)))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wn(wne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls))
  nne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls)
  ralnex(s0, c0, wne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls))
  3bitr4ri(wral(s0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls)), wceq(cin(cuni(c0), c1), emptycls), wss(cuni(c0), cdif(universe, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cdif(universe, c1))))
  unissb(s0, c0, cdif(universe, c1))
  disj2(cuni(c0), c1)
  ralbii(s0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls), wss(cv(s0), cdif(universe, c1)))
  disj2(cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, universe, c1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uniinn0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((⋃ c0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅ ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  necon1abii((⋃ c0 ⋂ c1), emptycls, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅))
  3bitr3i(¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅), (⋃ c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ¬(s0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ c1)= ∅))
  ralbii(s0, c0, ¬(s0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅, (s0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  nne((s0 ⋂ c1), emptycls)
  ralnex(s0, c0, (s0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
  3bitr4ri(∀(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ c1)= ∅), (⋃ c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅, ⋃ c0 ⊆(𝕌 \ c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ⊆(𝕌 \ c1)))
  unissb(s0, c0, (𝕌 \ c1))
  disj2(⋃ c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c0, (s0 ⋂ c1)= ∅, s0 ⊆(𝕌 \ c1))
  disj2(s0, c1)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, universe, c1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: difuncomp
blocks.content: Express a class difference using unions and class complements. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm difuncomp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c0, c2), cdif(c1, cun(cdif(c1, c0), c2))))
} = {
  eqtr4d(cdif(c0, c2), cdif(c1, cun(cdif(c1, c0), c2)), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2), wss(c0, c1))
  difeq1d(c0, c2, cin(c0, c1), wss(c0, c1))
  syl5reqr(c0, cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, c0), wss(c0, c1))
  incom(c1, c0)
  biimpi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0))
  sseqin2(c0, c1)
  syl6eq(cdif(c1, cun(cdif(c1, c0), c2)), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wss(c0, c1))
  syl5eq(cdif(c1, cun(cdif(c1, c0), c2)), cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cin(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c0)), cdif(c1, c2)), wss(c0, c1))
  difundi(c1, cdif(c1, c0), c2)
  ineq1d(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c0)), cdif(c1, c2), c0, wss(c0, c1))
  biimpi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c0)), c0))
  dfss4(c0, c1)
  indif2(c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm difuncomp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 →(c0 \ c2)=(c1 \((c1 \ c0)⋃ c2)))
} = {
  eqtr4d((c0 \ c2), (c1 \((c1 \ c0)⋃ c2)), ((c0 ⋂ c1)\ c2), c0 ⊆ c1)
  difeq1d(c0, c2, (c0 ⋂ c1), c0 ⊆ c1)
  syl5reqr(c0, (c0 ⋂ c1), (c1 ⋂ c0), c0 ⊆ c1)
  incom(c1, c0)
  biimpi(c0 ⊆ c1, (c1 ⋂ c0)= c0)
  sseqin2(c0, c1)
  syl6eq((c1 \((c1 \ c0)⋃ c2)), ((c0 ⋂ c1)\ c2), (c0 ⋂(c1 \ c2)), c0 ⊆ c1)
  syl5eq((c1 \((c1 \ c0)⋃ c2)), (c0 ⋂(c1 \ c2)), ((c1 \(c1 \ c0))⋂(c1 \ c2)), c0 ⊆ c1)
  difundi(c1, (c1 \ c0), c2)
  ineq1d((c1 \(c1 \ c0)), (c1 \ c2), c0, c0 ⊆ c1)
  biimpi(c0 ⊆ c1, (c1 \(c1 \ c0))= c0)
  dfss4(c0, c1)
  indif2(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: elpwunicl
blocks.content: Closure of a set union with regard to elementhood to a power set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpwunicl(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), cpw(c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c1))))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), cpw(c1))), wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2)))
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1))
  syl(w0, wss(cuni(c0), c1), wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
  mpbid(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c1))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c1))), wss(c0, cpw(c1))), wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c1))))
  elpwg(c0, cpw(cpw(c1)), cpw(c1))
  pwuniss(c0, c1)
  3syl(w0, wb(wcel(cuni(c0), cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1)), wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c1))), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  uniexg(c0, cpw(cpw(c1)))
  elpwg(cuni(c0), universe, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpwunicl(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ⋃ c0 ∈ P(c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ P(P(c1)))
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ⋃ c0 ∈ P(c1)), (w0 → c1 ∈ c2))
  mpbird(w0, ⋃ c0 ∈ P(c1), ⋃ c0 ⊆ c1)
  syl(w0, ⋃ c0 ⊆ c1, c0 ⊆ P(c1))
  mpbid(w0, c0 ⊆ P(c1), c0 ∈ P(P(c1)))
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ P(P(c1))↔ c0 ⊆ P(c1)), c0 ∈ P(P(c1)))
  elpwg(c0, P(P(c1)), P(c1))
  pwuniss(c0, c1)
  3syl(w0, (⋃ c0 ∈ P(c1)↔ ⋃ c0 ⊆ c1), c0 ∈ P(P(c1)), ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexg(c0, P(P(c1)))
  elpwg(⋃ c0, universe, c1)
}
